title: Fireball
content:
Fireball is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Fireball Information

Description: Shoot a bright flame from your fingers that explodes upon contact, torching everything in the vicinity. On Save: Targets still take half damage. Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Evocation School Casting Time:Action Range:18m6m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: DEX Save
